entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:20 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 2:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 7

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Hazy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:30 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Hazy this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 1:30 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:30 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
